episodes.original_body:
Case: Jae-Kale-Lewis-MVA-02-24-2025
Client: Jae Kale Lewis

From: ULH Customer Service 
Sent: Monday, March 10, 2025 3:27:46 PM
To: jessica@whaleylawfirm.com 
Subject: FW: Jae-Kale Lewis
 
Hello,

 

Your request has been received. Please allow up to 30 days for processing.

 

Please be advised that sending multiple requests during this time can cause delays with processing and receiving your request. However, when following up on requests, please ensure that the original request is attached to your email or that patient identifying information is provided to locate your previous request.

 

 

 

Thank you,

 

Laurie Brown

AR Billing/Customer Service Specialist
episodes.natural_language: Case: Jae-Kale-Lewis-MVA-02-24-2025 concerns client Jae Kale Lewis. On Monday, March 10, 2025 at 3:27:46 PM, ULH Customer Service sent an email from ULH Customer Service to jessica@whaleylawfirm.com with the subject "FW: Jae-Kale Lewis." The message states that the request has been received and asks to allow up to 30 days for processing. It also advises that sending multiple requests during this time can cause delays with processing and receiving the request. Additionally, when following up on requests, the original request should be attached to the email or patient identifying information should be provided to locate the previous request. The message ends with "Thank you, Laurie Brown AR Billing/Customer Service Specialist," indicating it was signed by Laurie Brown, AR Billing/Customer Service Specialist.
episodes.author: Jessica Bottorff

episodes.original_body:
Case: Jae-Kale-Lewis-MVA-02-24-2025
Client: Jae Kale Lewis

__Summary of the call with Steve Campbell__
From: Aaron Whaley [agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com](mailto:agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com)
To: Jae-Kale Lewis - Filevine Project Email Address [JaeKaleLewisMVAZ4938488@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com](mailto:JaeKaleLewisMVAZ4938488@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com)
Date: Mon Jul 28 2025 11:15:58 GMT-04:00

Hi

Here's the summary of the call with Steve Campbell at 7/28 11:12 AM
(UTC-04:00):

Aaron Whaley followed up on a client offer regarding treatment costs,
agreeing to a settlement of $5,000.

Recap

* Aaron Whaley called Steve Campbell to follow up on a client offer related
to treatment costs for back pain.
* The initial offer was for $5,000, which Steve confirmed he could accept.
* Aaron indicated that the offer was reasonable and agreed to proceed with
the settlement.

Tasks

* Aaron needs to finalize the settlement agreement for the client at $5,000.

Best,
aaron whaley

Powered by RingCentral AI Assistant (visit
https://www.ringcentral.com/ringex/ai-assistant for more information).
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Jae-Kale-Lewis-MVA-02-24-2025. Client: Jae Kale Lewis.

On July 28, 2025, at 11:12 AM (UTC-04:00), Aaron Whaley spoke with Steve Campbell to follow up on a client offer related to treatment costs for back pain. Whaley then sent a summary email on the same day, dated July 28, 2025 at 11:15:58 GMT-04:00, addressed to Jae Kale Lewis’s Filevine project email address. The recap states that the initial offer was for $5,000, which Steve Campbell confirmed he could accept. Whaley indicated that the offer was reasonable and that they should proceed with the settlement. The task is for Aaron Whaley to finalize the settlement agreement for the client at $5,000. The message closes with “Best, Aaron Whaley” and notes that it is powered by RingCentral AI Assistant.
episodes.author: Aaron Whaley
